name: I Believe You Should Exit
description:
Hello and welcome to our game

How TO play:
Game 1: "Looks like you push"
Mash the Q button to open the door!

Game 2: "Bottle flip"
Press the W button when the indicator is in the center of the bar to flip the bottle so Paul has to marry his mother-in-law!

Game 3: "TC Tugger™ top; It's got that knob"
Hold the E button when the hand is over that knob so you don't hurt your hand.

Game 4: "Skeleton Song"
Press the R button when the indicator is over the skulls to perform a song.

Game 5: "That's a Chanky"
Press the U button when the highlights square reaches the Chanky™. 

Game 6: "Motorcycle crosswalk"
Press the I button to cross the road its like frogger.

CREDITS:
Music by VNKNWN

Art by agentkity

Game by sharkeyboi
